newsitem.title: UK: Saudi cuts April Berri 20 cts to Europe-trade.
newsitem.headline: Saudi cuts April Berri 20 cts to Europe-trade.

text.p: Saudi Arabia cut the price of its Berri Extra Light crude by 20 cents a barrel for European customers in April, traders said on Tuesday.
This takes Berri down to Dated Brent -$1.10 a barrel from Dated Brent -$0.90 in March.
